title: GTALens Help
description:
[GTALens](https://gtalens.com) **|** [Donate](https://ko-fi.com/gtalens)

The words in ALL CAPS should be replaced with what you want.
You can edit old messages to avoid typing the same command, and commands work in DMs too.
⠀

fields.name: **__Jobs__**
fields.value:
**`.lens track TRACK` - lookup a race
`.lens track .random` - random list of tracks
`.lens creator CREATOR` - view creator's tob and recent jobs
`.lens sync SC_TRACK_LINK` - add creator to bot's database
**⠀

fields.name: **__Vehicles__**
fields.value:
**`.lens car CAR` - lookup a car
`.lens tier CLASS TIER` - get vehicles in a class's tier
`.lens class CLASS` - get vehicles in a class
**⠀

fields.name: **__Miscellaneous__**
fields.value:
**`.lens weather` - get current and future GTAO weather
**⠀

fields.name: **__Support__**
fields.value:
**`.lens invite` - invite GTALens to your server
`.lens donate` - support the devs
`.lens server` - join GTALens's server
**⠀

fields.name: **__Coming Soon!__**
fields.value:
**`.lens playlist CREATOR`
comparison of vehicle handling data
**
